Whoever said they own the disc so it doesn't matter if they get caught, it doesn't work that way.

When you download a torrent like this movie, you are downloading from other people while also uploading to others.  You don't get in trouble for the downloading part, but the uploading part is what you get fucked for.

You are uploading fragments of the movie to people that most likely don't own it, that is what you get sued for.  

If you were to only download and never upload, you would never get a legal notice from your ISP/movie studio but then all torrents would die if nobody ever uploaded.
